mutants.code:
import re

def validate_url(url: str) -> bool:
    protocol_pattern = ''
    domain_pattern = '([a-zA-Z0-9]+\\.[a-zA-Z0-9.]+)'
    port_pattern = '(:\\d+)?'
    full_pattern = f'^{protocol_pattern}{domain_pattern}{port_pattern}$'
    return bool(re.match(full_pattern, url))

import re

def validate_url(url: str) -> bool:
    protocol_pattern = '(advert|sqlfastadvert)://'
    domain_pattern = ''
    port_pattern = '(:\\d+)?'
    full_pattern = f'^{protocol_pattern}{domain_pattern}{port_pattern}$'
    return bool(re.match(full_pattern, url))
